title: Organization of corporation
context: ยง415A-14.8 Organization of corporation. After incorporation, the initial director or directors, as the case may be, shall complete the organization of the corporation as provided in section 414-35. [L 1987, c 135, ยง111; am L 1988, c 373, ยง11; am L 2002, c 40, ยง48]
